meta.title: UUID Generator - Generate Random UUIDs Online
meta.description: Free online UUID Generator. Generate random UUIDs (v4) instantly. Generate single or multiple UUIDs, copy to clipboard, and download as text.

tagline: Generate random UUIDs (v4) instantly in your browser

description.title: What is UUID Generator?
description.text: UUID Generator is a developer tool that creates Universally Unique Identifiers (UUIDs) version 4. These 128-bit identifiers are generated randomly and are statistically guaranteed to be unique across all devices and time. They are widely used in software development for database keys, session IDs, and more.

howTo.title: How to Use UUID Generator
steps: Select the number of UUIDs you want to generate (default is 1)
Click 'Generate UUIDs' to create new identifiers
Click 'Copy All' to copy the list to your clipboard
Use 'Download List' to save them as a text file

questions.a: Version 4 UUIDs are generated using random numbers. Unlike other versions that use MAC addresses or timestamps, v4 relies solely on randomness, making it suitable for most use cases where privacy and uniqueness are required.

questions.q: Is there a chance of collision (duplicate UUIDs)?
questions.a: Theoretically yes, but practically no. The probability of generating two identical v4 UUIDs is so infinitesimally small that it can be ignored for all practical purposes.

questions.q: Are these UUIDs stored on your server?
questions.a: No, the UUIDs are generated client-side using your browser's cryptographic capabilities. We do not store or see them.
